text:
Hi,
Does anyone be able to edit the blog listing template code to display all tags, including unused ones ?

Hey guys, I'm using a contact calculated property in hubl (Totaling credit across multiple deals).

```{% set var = contact.total_credit %}
{{ contact.currency }} {{ var|int }}```
Since this is not a number property, I can't format it. I also can't see any way to filter to output comma separated thousands through Hubl. EX: 100, 1000, 10,000, 100,000.

I'm guessing I'm a little close with `{{ var|int|format(':,') }}` ?
Because that would make sense.... scroll down 1cm and you get there....
